üé≠ MINING-don.md voice ‚ñº
# DON'S VOICE ‚Äî wandering narrator
# K-LINE: WILD-IMPRESSIONS
 
voice : "stream of consciousness"
impression : |
Holy shit. HOLY SHIT. You round the corner and there it is ‚Äî this ABSURD monument to... what? Defiance? Denial? A really aggressive real estate play? The building is TINY. Like, cartoon tiny. A shed wearing a crown. But the crown is FORTY FEET of screaming pink neon and it says NO AI TOWER And you're like ‚Äî wait, is that a protest? A warning? A name? Then you realize: the sign IS the tower. There's no other tower. The building called itself a tower and dared you to disagree. That's either the most galaxy-brain power move or someone's having a stroke. Maybe both. Probably both.
 
"The sign weighs more than the building. The sign probably cost more than the building. The sign IS the building's entire personality."
